0: Looks like they have done some renovating and upgrading
I thought the hotel could use some cosmetic updates ie chipping paint in the lobby dining area around the baseboards and cabinets caulking around the tub in the room was missing etc
Stated that since the reservation was done months ago they have renovated and no longer have that confirmed suite
There was no mention that the property was under construction remodeling when booking at this facility
the only issue that i had was with the swimming pool being closed for renovations this information was not provided at the time of booking
Hotel was under renovation and there was construction noise and hallways had supplies stored in them
We will be filing a claim to have it repaired but I feel they should have closed off that back parking lot if they were going to be spray painting
Old hotel that is being redone
The hotel was being renovated and the rooms had a very strong odor of paint fumes
The breakfast was godUnder renovation but making it better
1: The facility is undergoing renovation and upgrade
It had been newly remodeled and was greater than our expectations
The rooms were updated love bathroom shower
Recently remodeled and has a top notch breakfast buffet
Renovating the hotel so we had a beautiful newly renovated room
Hopefully they are able to focus more on their service now that the remodel should be done
Very clean even with renovations taking place
Hotel was remodeled which is a plus
I liked how clean everything was and the remodel is gorgeous the breakfast spread was awesome considering other places I have stayed at and the shower was amazing
